title: MG Motor India looks to expand network in tier III, IV to drive next phase of growth
description: MG Motor India aims to expand its presence in tier III and IV cities by establishing 100 new touchpoints by the fiscal year end. With plans to increase touchpoints to 520 across 270 cities by 2024-25, MG Motor embarks on its growth phase 'MG 2.0', focusing on production capacity enhancement and introducing new models.
